    • Method Detail

      • isNetworkTypeValid

        public boolean isNetworkTypeValid()
        check that the network type matches what is reported by the node this is useful to make sure that network type is OK. This method also loads network type if not specified in constructor
        Returns:
        true if reported network type matches expectation, false otherwise
